ygData.subject: Re: Research Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: really? 5 successes and 4 failures and no skill point for me...What did it say that your skill were? What s your level? ... From: Tim Borelli
ygData.messageBody:
really? 5 successes and 4 failures and no skill point for me...What did it
say that your skill were? What's your level?

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Borelli [mailto:timb@...]
Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 3:07 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Research Skill


From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>

same here for me, but contrary to what some are saying, i've used research
3 times and my skill has gone up all three times. 2 successes, one failure.

on a related note, i got a pic of the day!

http://eq.stratics.com/files/daily/d078.jpg

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 19th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 12:40 PM 5/24/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
>I was only able to use 1 practice point I think. Same for you guys?
>
